profile:
OGC - Ottawa General Contractors are leaders as Ottawa's design and build renovation experts. Specializing in home renovations, new and custom home construction as well as home design. With our project management and coordination, we're able to efficiently juggle more jobs, large and small, without dropping the ball. 

Ottawa General Contractors are an accredited business with the Ottawa BBB and our CEO, Moe Abbas is a former member of the board of directors for the Better Business Bureau (BBB).. Our skills and expert service has allowed us to expand to other cities in Canada including Vancouver and Calgary in less than 8 years making us one of the fastest growing construction companies. 

We offer warranty following the Tarion warranty guidelines for all our renovations and construction projects. We also have a design center and in house designers available to help you design and build your home. With over 50 years of experience, our team has the knowledge, the tools, the skill-set and the resources to give you the best value for your dollar at unbeatable service. 

We at Ottawa General Contractors understand that you are looking for value with your renovation services. Trust our team to do it right the first time! Call us directly at (613) 225-9991!

Visit our website for all our credentials and more information.

profile:
blu Dot interiors first opened our doors to clients' homes in 2005. Since then, we've guided our clients through many diverse and exciting projects: From completing home renovations, to dressing up windows with beautiful custom drapes, to staging countless homes with Real Estate Agents and clients to make that all-important difference when selling your home.

We adore creating an environment for our clients that makes them love the space they live in. We deliver to each of our clients a custom service that's designed specifically for them, their families and their surroundings.

profile:
WestHouse Digital has a broad practice in architectural and interior design. "Better Design, Better Life" is the philosophy of the company. We respect every different lifestyle and make the design tailored to each client. No matter what is your dream, we will make it true. We are home design experts. There is no project minimum. It could be as small as an as-built drawing of the existing layout for a restaurant or a bathroom redesign. We take care of you and get your request complete on time.
 
List of Services:
 
(1)Site measurement & as-built floor plan or elevations.
(2)Design New space in a residential project such as kitchen, garage, basement, bathroom, theater room, media room, kids bedroom, family room...no matter if that is an addition or not. The structural modification is included because we will have a structural engineer involved case by case.
(3)Design a New House, townhouse, semi-detached house as new construction. 
(4)Interior Design that includes build-in cabinet, furniture layout, wall and floor deco, lighting design, and fixture selection.
(5)Exterior & Interior color selection that includes hardwood floor, carpet, floor and wall tile, paint color, brick, stone, soffit, shingle, window color, etc.
(6)Drafting services based on project requirements that range from marketing drawing, furniture layout to construction detail or working drawings.
(7)Produce working drawings and apply for building permit in Ontario (certified in Ontario)
 
 
---------------WestHouse Digital gives you Better Design Better Life.------------------------
